alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 19 at 6:55AM PDT until October 19 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than a quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia, Greater Portland Metro Area and Central Willamette Valley. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until noon PDT today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog may be patchy at times. Fog should begin to lift after sunrise, but will likely linger longer along the Columbia River. Fog will be combined with smoke or haze.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
